file_content.text: Thank you again. We owe you much.
Captain Rigel awaits the final report.
I've heard most satisfactory reports of your success in the Balmorran Arms Factory.
And that fool Vol Argen played right into our hands. There can be no doubt: The resistance is crushed.
War is my trade. Victory was inevitable.
Of course it is.
The Balmorrans now know better than to challenge the Empire.
They were foolish.
The Sith are our true secret weapon, without a doubt.
I'm duty-bound to serve the Empire.
Just doing my job.
And for that you will be well rewarded.
You didn't hire the best gun in the galaxy for nothing.
Just doing my job.
We chose very wisely indeed.
They put up a good fight, but I think they'll be more agreeable now.
They tried nobly.
Undoubtedly.
Good luck with the final assault, Colonel.
The war's in your hands now.
Thank you.
Captain Rigel is in charge of writing up the report on this one. If I could ask you for one final favor--that you report your success to him.
The sooner you take out the security at the Balmorran Arms Factory, the sooner our army can invade.
My lord. Let me be the first to tell you how appreciated your work has been.
Hunter. You are better than the common mercenary, you've proven that much.
Agent. Captain Rigel did well to recruit you.
The Imperial Conquest Consolidation Corps owes you a debt of gratitude already.
Today the Balmorran resistance, backed by the government-in-exile, takes its last pitiful gasp. We have you to thank.
It won't be long before the corpse of former Defense Minister Vol Argen is cold in the ground.
Has the former defense minister come to Balmorra?
Is Vol Argen here?
That's the rumor, but either way, if Operation Breaking Point succeeds, his death is only a matter of time.
I hope to be the one to kill this defense minister.
Vol Argen is mine.
I hope you intend to say thanks with some form of reward.
Words don't buy me anything.
That could be in the cards, if you pull off this last play.
The resistance, aided by the Republic, has made its headquarters in the Balmorran Arms Factory.
It is a heavily fortified facility, but it's not invulnerable. Not with such powerful patriots as yourselves on our side.
It is a heavily fortified facility, but it's not invulnerable. Not with such a powerful patriot as yourself on our side.
The factory will be destroyed by nightfall, I vow it.
They will suffer.
I await your orders.
What's the mission?
I'm pleased that you have such confidence in me.
Thank you.
If we may impose on you for one final task in service of the glorious Empire.
We need you to break into the factory, shut off its power and use the period of panic to shut down security.
Once this is done, the main attack force can sweep in and wipe out the resistance. And if you see Vol Argen, kill him.
It's an honor to serve.
Consider it done.
It's time we cut the head off this serpent.
Let's finish this.
Just be wary.
This will be like terrorizing children.
Fun.
Perhaps, but I wouldn't go in too overconfident.
Word is the resistance at the factory have the Republic's backing. They'll be well equipped and well trained.
For anyone else, this would be a suicide mission. I wouldn't consider it. But I have a good feeling about you.
Soon this will all be over.
